title: Gold 3 support LF Duo / Jungler / ADC (P3 Last Season)

embed.description: Niege / Gold 4 93LP / 87W 91L Win Ratio 49% / Blitzcrank - 73W 74L Win Ratio 50%, Thresh - 11W 17L Win Ratio 39%, Anivia - 0W 4L Win Ratio 0%, Leona - 2W 0L Win Ratio 100%, Fiddlesticks - 0W 2L Win Ratio 0%

body:
Hey all,

I'm looking for a solo queue buddy, to focus on climbing beyond platinum, and trying to seriously push to Diamond. I peaked Platinum 3 last season, and started Bronze 4, as mostly a support main / one tricking champions.

Champion Pool: Thresh / Bliz / Braum / Alistar / Leona / Lulu / Naud / Pyke / Rakan 
Note: I don't play heal based supports, such as nami / raka, as I find them counter productive.

Requirements: 

Discord 
Be ranked Platinum in season 9. 
English Only 
No Toxic 
Aim To Improve 
Wanting to push passed Platinum 
Discord + Working Microphone

Thanks for reading, I also stream on Twitch.

Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/niege

Online now.
